mapper.insert: insert into dispoint (dispointId, dispointname, provinceId, countryId, adminId, phone, address, remarks) values (#{dispointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dispointname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update dispoint set dispointname = #{dispointname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceId = #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countryId = #{countryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adminId = #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dispointId = #{dispointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dispointId, dispointname, provinceId, countryId, adminId, phone, address, remarks from dispoint where dispointId = #{dispointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
